message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that's worth a lot to me, and I think it could be valuable for you too. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate you coming down on your price. I'm still looking to get a bit closer to my value for this product. Would you be willing to consider $9,500? It's a fair price that allows me to recoup some of my investment and still leaves a good deal for you.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $9,500, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about $9,250?
